attributes.action: Vote no confidence in Boris Johnson’s government for pandemic handling of Covid
attributes.additional_details:
Chinese Scientists published warnings in a UK scientific journal (The Lancet) as early as January yet nothing was done. 

Other countries have been hit by the virus before us and it appears that the government learnt no lessons from their experiences or warnings. 

Instead the Government followed a reckless and callous path which appears to have been aimed at appeasing big business as the expense of small business and public health. These are not the actions a a Government fit for power.
attributes.background: The parliament should seriously debate whether The Governments negligence in handling the Covid-19 pandemic should lead to a vote of no confidence and put someone competent in place in their stead.

rejection.details:
We also can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for vote of no confidence in the Government.
